short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new and innovative way to report bugs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Modern problems requires modern solution", so here's a new and innovative way to report bugs. Takes screenshots, report issues and email to maintainers all at the click of a few buttons.
